alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Gulf and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 429 PM EDT/329 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blountstown to 6 miles northeast of Port St. Joe. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Honeyville, Clarksville, Abe Springs, Chipola Cutoff, Chipola, Red Hill, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Estiffanulga, Kern, Kinard, Willis Landing, Blountstown Airport, Hugh Creek and Chipola Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
